com.lpoo.game.model.entities

Class EntityModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.model.entities.EntityModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BallModel, BoxModel, PowerUp

    public abstract class EntityModel
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract model representing an entity belonging to a game model.

        world - world the entity model will be in.
        pos - entity model initial position.
        type - entity model type.
        angDamp - entity model angular damping.
        linDamp - entity model linear damping.
